projects.title: RAG System - LIT-RAG
projects.short_desc: Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for document analysis and intelligent Q&A with semantic search capabilities.
projects.description: Built a comprehensive RAG pipeline using Python, FastAPI, and Streamlit for intelligent document processing. Integrated with Supabase for vector storage and deployed for real-time usage.

projects.title: CampVerse
projects.short_desc: Modern web application for event discovery and participation with responsive design and real-time features.
projects.description: Full-stack web application built with React and Vite, featuring campground listings, user authentication, and booking system. Containerized with Docker for easy deployment.

projects.title: HGR-ParallelCNN-XAI
projects.short_desc: Hand Gesture Recognition with Explainable AI using ParallelCNN architecture, SHAP, and Grad-CAM visualization.
projects.description: Developed an advanced hand gesture recognition system with explainable AI capabilities. Implemented ParallelCNN architecture and integrated SHAP and Grad-CAM for model interpretability.

projects.title: Medical Image Segmentation
projects.short_desc: U-Net based medical image segmentation pipeline using PyTorch Lightning for efficient training and deployment.
projects.description: Implemented a robust medical image segmentation system using U-Net architecture with PyTorch Lightning. Optimized for medical imaging datasets with data augmentation and validation pipelines.

projects.title: Bilateral Plantar Classifier
projects.short_desc: IoT-based gait classification system using Arduino sensors and Random Forest algorithm for plantar pressure analysis.
projects.description: Developed an innovative gait analysis system combining Arduino hardware with machine learning. Used Random Forest algorithm to classify gait patterns from bilateral plantar pressure data.
